DOC.brief_summary: The purpose of this study is to determine the effectiveness of adding dual focus 12-step self-help groups to standard treatment to improve behavioral outcomes for patients dually diagnosed with substance abuse and psychiatric disorders.
DOC.brief_title: Effectiveness of Self-Help for Dually-Diagnosed Persons - 1
DOC.criteria: Admission to psychiatric day treatment program 1864 years old Did not understand or speak English, appeared intoxicated on drugs or alcohol, carried a diagnosis of mental retardation, were deemed actively psychotic by the clinic's intake coordinator, appeared unable to understand and give informed consent.
